mapper.select: select R.request_id as request_id, R.cargo_name as cargo_name, U.user_id as user_id, U.courier_avg_time as courier_avg_time, U.courier_avg_kind as courier_avg_kind, U.courier_avg_safe as courier_avg_safe, U.courier_totalcnt as courier_totalcnt, U.courier_successcnt as courier_successcnt, R.request_status as request_status, C.sender_evalstatus as sender_evalstatus from REQUESTS R left join USERS U on R.courier_id=U.user_id left join COMPLETE_DELIVERYS C on R.request_id=C.request_id where R.sender_id=#{userId} and R.report_status=null
